name: Save the Universe, Please!
description: Take command of the crew of the ESS Shyp, explore planets, and deal with friendship, betrayal and maybe love! It's up to you to Save the Universe! It's your choice, so Please, don't let the Universe down!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 487 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM
